bio:
Mithorpa Nasyal is a farmer who lives and works on a farm located on the vast plains of Whiterun Hold. His farm is named Barleydark Farm. Wolves and giants are common problems in the area. A short distance west of the farm, there is a strange cluster of small stone structures, of ancient Nordic origin. The Brittleshin Hills mountains are visible to the southeast of the farm.
Mithorpa is a Dunmer. He wears typical farmer clothing. He grows potatoes, wheat, and squash. He also raises chickens and cows, and has a dog.
Quotes:
"I am but a humble farmer. Not a… a great wanderer, like you."
"The Grey Quarter in Windhelm is little more than a slum. Thank the Divines I can choose to live somewhere else."
If speaking to a fellow Dunmer: "Well look at us. Like two gray specks in the snow."
name: Mithorpa Nasyal
notes: Shawn - done. This NPC is not instantiated in vanilla Skyrim. He and his farm are cut content. They will be in your game if you use the mod Cutting Room Floor (recommended).
